root.MsgInfo: select top 1 Cd,ZoneCd,OrganCd,FIELDPK from SPM_SPMPatInfoMana where ZoneCd like '51%' and State=1 and DelStatus='DelLogo001' and len(isnull(FIELDPK,''))=0
SELECT TOP 5 * FROM SPM_SPMPatInfoMana where len(isnull(FIELDPK,''))=0 and DelStatus='DelLogo001' and State='1' and CreTime<='2018-01-01'
select top 1 Cd,ZoneCd,OrganCd,FIELDPK from SPM_SPMPatInfoMana where Cd='1767d41f-ff08-4c9f-980d-a7adacb7e27f' and State=1 and DelStatus='DelLogo001'
select top 100 Cd,ZoneCd,OrganCd,FIELDPK from SPM_SPMPatInfoMana where ZoneCd like '5101%' and State=1 and DelStatus='DelLogo001' and len(isnull(FIELDPK,''))!=0
SELECT TOP 2000 * FROM SPM_SPMPatInfoMana where FIELDPK is not null and DelStatus='DelLogo001' and State='1'
select top 10 * from SPM_SPMPatInfoMana where FIELDPK is null and State=1 and DelStatus='DelLogo001'
select top 10 * from SPM_SPMPatInciRpt where FIELDPK is null and State=1 and DelStatus='DelLogo001' and SyncStatus=''
select top 100 * from SPM_SPMPatInciRpt where FIELDPK is not null and State=1 and DelStatus='DelLogo001' and SyncStatus=''
select top 100 * from SPM_SPMPatInciRpt where DelStatus='DelLogo002'
select top 100 * from SPM_SPMPatLeftRpt where FIELDPK is null and State='1' and DelStatus='DelLogo001' and SyncStatus=''
select top 100 * from SPM_SPMPatLeftRpt where SyncStatus=''and DelStatus='DelLogo001'
select top 100 * from SPM_SPMPatLeftRpt where SyncStatus=''and DelStatus='DelLogo002'
select top 10 * from SPM_SPMPatFollowup where CreTime<='2018-12-31' and CreTime>='2018-01-01' and DelStatus='DelLogo001' and State='1'
